item.title: Projects
item.description: This is a gallery of all my projects. Click on them for more information!

item.title: About
item.description:
Welcome! My name is Markus Engsner, and this is my personal website. Here I showcase things I make, as well as write about things that I happen to find interesting.

I spend most of my spare time programming, as well as building various electronic gadgets and robots. Currently I’m mostly doing various programming challenges. You can find some of the solutions on my Github (linked on the left). I have experience in the programming languages C++, C and Python.

item.title: A new beginning
item.description:
I bought this domain back in November last year, but I never ended up doing anything with it, due in part to me trying to make it from scratch with Django. However, I finally caved in and realized that it wouldn’t ever be finished that way. Therefore, I have decided to run it using the Hugo framework instead.

The plan is to post the various projects I decide to tackle in my spare time, as well as whatever else comes to mind. Only time will tell what actually ends up happening though!
